source: おうたが寝てから向かいます
seed: I'll head there after Outa goes to sleep

polite_25.new_translation: I will head there after Outa goes to sleep
polite_25.reverse_translation: おうたが寝た後でそちらに向かいます

polite_50.new_translation: I shall head there after Outa retires for the night.
polite_50.reverse_translation: おうたが就寝した後、そちらに向かいます

polite_75.new_translation: I will head there after Outa retires for the night.

polite_100.new_translation: I shall proceed there after Outa retires for the night.

business_100.new_translation: I shall proceed there upon Outa's retirement for the night.
business_100.reverse_translation: おうたが就寝なさったら、私はそこに向かいます

polite_50.new_translation: I appear to have forgotten my wallet.

business_100.new_translation: I regret to inform you that I have forgotten my wallet.

seed: Can you send it to me?

casual_25.new_translation: Could you maybe send it to me?

source: 遅れてごめん、電車が止まってた
seed: Sorry I'm late, the train stopped.

casual_25.new_translation: Sorry I'm running late, the train's stuck.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 遅れてすみません、電車が止まっています

casual_50.new_translation: Sorry I'm running late - the train's stuck!
casual_50.reverse_translation: ごめん、遅れてる - 電車が止まってる！

casual_75.reverse_translation: 遅れる！電車が止まってる！

casual_100.new_translation: I'm running late! Train's dead stopped!
casual_100.reverse_translation: 遅刻だ！電車が完全に止まってる！

polite_25.new_translation: I apologize for being late; the train came to a halt.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 遅刻して申し訳ありません、電車が止まりました。

polite_50.new_translation: I regret to inform that I am late due to the train having come to a stop.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 遅刻したことをお詫び申し上げますが、電車が止まっておりましたためです。

polite_75.new_translation: I am sorry to report that my arrival is delayed because the train has come to a halt.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 到着が遅れていることをお詫び申し上げます。電車が停止したためです。

polite_100.new_translation: I regret to inform you that my arrival is delayed owing to the train having come to a standstill.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 到着が遅れることを残念に思います。電車が停止しているためです。

business_25.new_translation: I'm sorry for being late; the train came to a halt.
business_25.reverse_translation: 遅刻して申し訳ありません、電車が止まりました

business_50.new_translation: I apologize for being late; the train came to a halt.
business_50.reverse_translation: 遅刻して申し訳ありません、電車が止まりました。

business_75.new_translation: I apologize for the delay; the train has come to a stop.
business_75.reverse_translation: 遅れのお詫び申し上げます。電車が止まっておりましたので。

business_100.new_translation: I regret the delay; the train has stopped.
business_100.reverse_translation: 遅延をお詫び申し上げます。電車が停止しましたので。

business_75.new_translation: I am scheduled to depart tomorrow.
business_75.reverse_translation: 私は明日出発する予定です

business_100.new_translation: I am scheduled to depart tomorrow.
business_100.reverse_translation: 明日出発する予定です。

source: もし時間があれば、手伝ってもらえると助かるんだけど

source: 田中さんが来週の月曜に50人分の資料を持ってくるらしいよ

business_25.new_translation: Tanaka-san appears to be bringing the materials for 50 people next Monday.

business_50.new_translation: Tanaka-san is likely to bring the materials for 50 people next Monday.
